main event: A crew and passengers of a KLM aircraft reported seeing a silver disc-shaped object hovering over Mount Kilimanjaro in East Africa on February 19, 1951.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 17 minutes., The object was described as circular, about 50 feet in diameter., Observers saw the object accelerate rapidly and disappear from view., The crew and passengers attempted to evaluate its composition by throwing objects at it., The sighting was corroborated by contacts made with the French Consulate.
witness description: crew and passengers of the KLM aircraft
